verbs.description: As [ARG0: I] [V: understand] [ARG1: President Trumps “ great thing for the world ”] : North Korea agrees to the same vague , no time table nuclear disarmament agreement ( or similar terms ) that the world nuclear powers , including the US , have agreed to which requires them ...
